original_text:
Zion stretches out her hands,
    but there is no one to comfort her.
The Lord has decreed for Jacob
    that his neighbors become his foes;
Jerusalem has become
    an unclean thing among them.
korean_text: 시온이 두 손을 폈으나 그를 위로할 자가 없도다 여호와께서 야곱의 사방에 있는 자들에게 명령하여 야곱의 대적들이 되게 하셨으니 예루살렘은 그들 가운데에 있는 불결한 자가 되었도다

sentences.original_text: but there is no one to comfort her
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀를 위로해 줄 사람이 아무도 없다

sentences.original_text: The Lord has decreed for Jacob
that his neighbors become his foes
